snippet: At least 16 people have been burned alive or hacked to death with machetes, and dozens wounded, during two days of ethnic clashes in the south.
abstract: At least 16 people have been burned alive or hacked to death with machetes, and dozens wounded, during two days of ethnic clashes in southern Guinea.
lead_paragraph: At least 16 people have been burned alive or hacked to death with machetes, and dozens wounded, during two days of ethnic clashes in the south.

headline.main: Guinea: Gas Station Theft Ignites Deadly Ethnic Clashes
headline.print_headline: Guinea: Gas Station Theft Ignites Deadly Ethnic Clashes
